item.description:
http://www.gardnermus...

January 21st, 2010 – Buon Novo

Celebrate the New Year and new beginnings. Did you know Gardner actually opened her museum to the public on the evening of January 1st, 1903? Sure it’s been a few weeks since New Year’s but we’ll celebrate just like Gardner did back in the day with champagne and donuts!

Courtyard Music: Violinist Emil Altschuler and guitarist Jerome Mouffe perform from 5:30-7pm and then again from 8:15-9pm.

Artist Talk @ 7pm: Stop by the special exhibition gallery for a talk about the exhibition by artist Taro Shinoda

Viewfinder Conversations: Join a discussion about John S. Sargent’s famous portrait of Isabella Gardner (every half-hour), plus other impromptu gallery discussions (6 to 8:30PM)

Sketching in the Galleries: Drop by the Dutch Room and sketch for a while, from 6-9pm.

Please check the site to see more details.
Become a member, enjoy Europe without flying.

Maia 781-718-6203

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Winter Escape
